Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper

Interface ComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>

Type Parameters:
X -
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Comparator<X>, Helper<X>, Instrument, NonComparableHelper<X>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseComparableHelper, NonInstrumentingComparableHelper
public interface ComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>> extends NonComparableHelper<X>
Helper interface which extends NonComparableHelper.

A Helper provides all the utilities that are needed by sort methods, for example, compare and swap. CONSIDER renaming this interface as ComparableHelper and the NonComparableHelper as Helper.

  • Method Details

    • compare

      default int compare(X v, X w)
      Compare value v with value w.

      CONSIDER using the commented-out code in order that ALL Comparable comparisons go through pureComparison.

      Specified by:
      compare in interface Comparator<X extends Comparable<X>>
      Parameters:
      v - the first value.
      w - the second value.
      Returns:
      -1 if v is less than w; 1 if v is greater than w; otherwise 0.

    • getComparator

      default Comparator<X> getComparator()
      Provides a comparator for comparing elements of type X.
      Specified by:
      getComparator in interface Helper<X extends Comparable<X>>
      Returns:
      a Comparator instance that uses the compareTo method of the Comparable interface for comparing elements.
